notif.warptocrosshair.warp.too_close: That point is too close to warp to!
notif.warptocrosshair.warp.no_permission: You do not have permission to warp in this world.
config.warptocrosshair.title: Warp-To-Crosshair
config.warptocrosshair.option.bufferDist: Determines how far you are placed from your warp target
config.warptocrosshair.option.playSounds: Enables / disables the ticking sounds used in the warp effect
